Neil,

Your suggestion has a spark of creativity; although I'm unclear if =
it 
contemplated companies that are "inside-the-container" test shops.  
Pe=
rhaps you were thinking of running JUnit from a 1.5 JVM redirecting 
to a 1=
.4 application server?  hhmmm ...
 
The development and promotion environme=
nt at a large company is very 
(or "very very") prescriptive.  Creativity i=
s exercised in solving 
business problems - not in configuring the environm=
ent.  (Or, even in 
using the latest and greatest technology.)

_Marvin
